price: Watasema: Ni vya Mwenyezi Mungu! Sema: Basi, je, hamkumbuki?
footnotes: Watakiri kuwa ardhi ni ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Basi hapo tena waambie: Hamkumbuki kuwa Mwenye kumiliki hayo ndiye anaye faa kuabudiwa peke yake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
